text: adara matannu keli avaru (sulaiman) nakkubittaru mattu helidaru; nannodeya, ninu nanage hagu nanna hettavarige karunisiruva anugrahagaligagi ninage krtajnate sallisuva mattu ninu meccuvantaha karmagalannu maduva saubhagyavannu nanage karunisu mattu ninna anugrahadinda ninu nannannu ninna sajjana dasara salige serisu
